mapper.select: SELECT b.bp_name, n.mtl_date, n.mtl_manager, MIN(n.mtl_wish_date) mtl_wish_date FROM mtl_need n JOIN business_partner b ON n.bp_code = b.bp_code GROUP BY b.bp_name, n.mtl_date, n.mtl_manager ORDER BY n.mtl_date DESC

WITH c as (SELECT c.mtl_code, MAX(mtl_in_date)mtl_in_date,SUM(mtl_lot_cnt)mtl_lot_cnt FROM mtl_container c GROUP BY c.mtl_code) SELECT c.mtl_code, get_common(mtl_type, '003') AS mtl_type, t.mtl_name, mtl_in_date, mtl_lot_cnt FROM c JOIN mtl_table t ON c.mtl_code = t.mtl_code
SELECT o.mtl_out_code, o.mtl_lot_num, o.mtl_code, o.mtl_out_cnt, o.prcs_rs_code, p.prcs_edate FROM mtl_out o JOIN process_result p ON o.prcs_rs_code = p.prcs_rs_code WHERE mtl_code = #{mtlCode}

WITH c as (SELECT c.mtl_code, MAX(p.prcs_edate)prcs_edate, SUM(mtl_out_cnt)mtl_out_cnt FROM mtl_out c JOIN process_result p ON c.prcs_rs_code = p.prcs_rs_code GROUP BY c.mtl_code) SELECT c.mtl_code, get_common(mtl_type, '003') AS mtl_type, t.mtl_name, prcs_edate, mtl_out_cnt FROM c JOIN mtl_table t ON c.mtl_code = t.mtl_code

WITH c as (SELECT c.mtl_code,SUM(mtl_lot_cnt)mtl_lot_cnt FROM mtl_container c GROUP BY c.mtl_code) SELECT c.mtl_code, get_common(mtl_type, '003') AS mtl_type, t.mtl_name, mtl_lot_cnt, mtl_ss, (mtl_lot_cnt - mtl_ss)mtl_now, mtl_unit FROM c JOIN mtl_table t ON c.mtl_code = t.mtl_code
WHERE (c.mtl_lot_cnt - t.mtl_ss) < 0

SELECT mtl_code, mtl_name, mtl_pass_cnt, mtl_chk_date, mtl_chk_manager, mtl_chk_code, get_common(mtl_chk_status, '009') AS mtl_chk_status FROM mtl_chk JOIN mtl_table USING(mtl_code) WHERE mtl_chk_status = 'MT02'
mapper.update: UPDATE mtl_need SET mtl_cnt = #{mtlCnt}, mtl_wish_date = #{mtlWishDate} WHERE mtl_code = #{mtlCode} AND TO_CHAR(mtl_date,'YY/MM/DD') = TO_CHAR(#{mtlDate},'YY/MM/DD')
mapper.select:
SELECT n.mtl_code , n.mtl_date, b.bp_name ,b.bp_code, get_common(t.mtl_type, '003') AS mtl_type , t.mtl_name , n.mtl_cnt , t.mtl_unit , n.mtl_manager , n.mtl_wish_date ,get_common (mtl_where, '009') mtl_where_nm, n.mtl_where, n.need_code FROM mtl_need n JOIN mtl_table t ON n.mtl_code = t.mtl_code JOIN business_partner b ON n.bp_code = b.bp_code WHERE t.mtl_name like '%'||#{mtlName}||'%' AND n.mtl_manager like '%'||#{mtlManager}||'%'
AND TO_CHAR(n.mtl_date,'YY/MM/DD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(#{startMtlNeedDate},'YY/MM/DD') AND TO_CHAR(#{endMtlNeedDate},'YY/MM/DD')
AND TO_CHAR(n.mtl_wish_date,'YY/MM/DD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(#{startMtlWishDate},'YY/MM/DD') AND TO_CHAR(#{endMtlWishDate},'YY/MM/DD')

SELECT mtl_code, mtl_name, mtl_pass_cnt, mtl_chk_date, mtl_chk_manager, mtl_chk_code, get_common(mtl_chk_status, '009') AS mtl_chk_status FROM mtl_chk JOIN mtl_table USING(mtl_code) WHERE mtl_chk_status = 'MT02' AND mtl_name like '%'||#{mtlName}||'%' AND mtl_chk_manager like '%'||#{mtlManager}||'%'
AND TO_CHAR(mtl_chk_date,'YY/MM/DD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(#{startMtlInDate},'YY/MM/DD') AND TO_CHAR(#{endMtlInDate},'YY/MM/DD')

SELECT c.mtl_lot_num, get_common(t.mtl_type, '003') AS mtl_type, c.mtl_code, t.mtl_name, c.mtl_in_date, c.mtl_in_cnt, NVL(sum(h.holding_cnt),0) holding_sum, c.mtl_lot_cnt FROM mtl_container c JOIN mtl_table t ON c.mtl_code = t.mtl_code LEFT JOIN holding h ON c.mtl_lot_num = h.mtl_lot_num WHERE c.mtl_code = #{mtlCode} GROUP BY c.mtl_lot_num, mtl_type, c.mtl_code, t.mtl_name, c.mtl_in_date, c.mtl_in_cnt, c.mtl_lot_cnt ORDER BY mtl_lot_num

SELECT b.bp_code, b.bp_name, get_common(t.mtl_type, '003') AS mtl_type, n.mtl_code, t.mtl_name, t.mtl_unit, n.mtl_cnt, n.mtl_date , get_common(n.mtl_where, '009')mtl_where, n.need_code, n.mtl_wish_date, n.mtl_manager FROM mtl_need n JOIN mtl_table t ON n.mtl_code = t.mtl_code JOIN business_partner b ON b.bp_code = n.bp_code WHERE b.bp_name = #{bpName} AND TO_CHAR(n.mtl_date, 'yy/MM/dd') = TO_CHAR(#{mtlDate}, 'yy/MM/dd') AND n.mtl_manager = #{mtlManager}

SELECT b.bp_name, n.mtl_date, n.mtl_manager, MIN(n.mtl_wish_date) mtl_wish_date FROM mtl_need n JOIN business_partner b ON n.bp_code = b.bp_code WHERE b.bp_name LIKE '%'||#{bpName}||'%'
AND TO_CHAR(n.mtl_date,'YY/MM/DD') BETWEEN TO_CHAR(#{startMtlNeedDate},'YY/MM/DD') AND TO_CHAR(#{endMtlNeedDate},'YY/MM/DD')
GROUP BY b.bp_name, n.mtl_date, n.mtl_manager

WITH c as (SELECT c.mtl_code, MAX(mtl_in_date)mtl_in_date,SUM(mtl_lot_cnt)mtl_lot_cnt FROM mtl_container c GROUP BY c.mtl_code) SELECT c.mtl_code, get_common(mtl_type, '003') AS mtl_type, t.mtl_name, mtl_in_date, mtl_lot_cnt FROM c JOIN mtl_table t ON c.mtl_code = t.mtl_code WHERE t.mtl_name LIKE '%'||#{mtlName}||'%'
AND mtl_type = #{mtlType}

WITH c as (SELECT c.mtl_code, MAX(p.prcs_edate)prcs_edate, SUM(mtl_out_cnt)mtl_out_cnt FROM mtl_out c JOIN process_result p ON c.prcs_rs_code = p.prcs_rs_code GROUP BY c.mtl_code) SELECT c.mtl_code, get_common(mtl_type, '003') AS mtl_type, t.mtl_name, prcs_edate, mtl_out_cnt FROM c JOIN mtl_table t ON c.mtl_code = t.mtl_code WHERE t.mtl_name LIKE '%'||#{mtlName}||'%'
AND mtl_type = #{mtlType}
